### **Personal Support Worker Services Tender Announcement**

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites individuals or businesses to bid on a contract for Personal Support Worker (PSW) services to support an employee with disabilities in Ottawa, Ontario.

#### **Background and Requirements**

The RCMP is seeking PSW services on a full-time basis to address the needs of an employee with disabilities. This is a continuous requirement to fulfill the obligations under the Employment Equity Act to provide accommodations for employees in need of mobility assistance.

The contract will also require a Backup PSW on an as-needed basis to provide similar care aide services in the absence of the Primary PSW.

#### **Security Requirements**

The contractor's resources must be security cleared at the level of RCMP Facility Access Level 2 – FA2 with escort, verified by the Personnel Security Unit (PSU) of the RCMP.

#### **Selection Criteria**

Tenders must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### **Timeline and Deliverables**

The required services are to start on April 1, 2024. The contract will be awarded based on the bid evaluation process, and the successful bidder will be required to provide a detailed project plan and schedule.

#### **Important Documents and Information**

Tenders must be submitted electronically in either English or French to David.Repsys@rcmp-grc.gc.ca. The solicitation document and all attachments can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

### **Indigenous Procurement**

The RCMP encourages Indigenous businesses to participate in this tender process and take advantage of the incentives offered through the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses.
